channel.title: Kubernetes on xiwang
channel.description: Recent content in Kubernetes on xiwang

item.title: Kubernetes出现pods服务一直处于ContainerCreating状态
item.description: 创建单机Kubenetes集群环境后，Pod一直处于ContainerCreating状态： [root@VM_0_3_centos]# kubectl get pods NAME READY STATUS RESTARTS AGE myweb-pgn80 0/1 ContainerCreating 0 10m 查看Pod的Even

item.title: Kubernetes无法创建pod
item.description: 环境 腾讯云CentOS7.3 使用yum安装etcd和Kubernetes软件 yum install -y ectd kubernetes 按顺序启动所有的服务 systemctl start etcd systemctl start docker systemctl start kube-apiserver systemctl start kube-controller-manager systemctl start kube-scheduler systemctl start
